#labels Phase-Support
<p align="center"><img src="http://wfrog.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/logo-web.png"/></p>
==Debian-based Linux Distributions==

  * Download and install the latest wfrog package *.deb* file from the [http://code.google.com/p/wfrog/downloads/list download page]
  * Plug your station and [SupportedStations check notes about your station model].
  * Run `sudo wfrog`
  * Open http://localhost:7680/

==Other Linux Distributions==

  * Download and decompress the latest *.tgz* wfrog distribution from the [http://code.google.com/p/wfrog/downloads/list download page] or [http://code.google.com/p/wfrog/source/checkout checkout from subversion].
  * Install the dependencies
{{{
sudo easy_install cheetah                  # Template engine
sudo easy_install lxml                     # XML serialization 
sudo easy_install pyusb                    # (optional) If your station is USB
sudo easy_install pyserial                 # (optional) If your station is serial
sudo easy_install pyyaml                   # For reading config files
sudo easy_install pygooglechart            # Chart rendering
}}}
  * Plug your station and [SupportedStations check notes about your station model]
  * Run `sudo bin/wfrog` 
  * Open http://localhost:7680/

== Windows ==

  * Download and install the latest win32 wfrog zip file from the [http://code.google.com/p/wfrog/downloads/list download page]
  * Plug your station and [SupportedStations check notes about your station model].
  * Run `wfrog.exe`
  * Open http://localhost:7680/
